sentences.sContent: The contents of legal education should be an unification of catholicity and pertinence.
sentences.sContent_eng: The contents of legal education should be an unification of catholicity and pertinence.
sentences.sCn: 法学教育的内容应是普遍性与针对性的统一。

sentences.sContent: Governmentstandard consciousness lives actually to behave be many sided mediumly in the society, and have catholicity .

sentences.sCn: 官本位意识在社会实际生活中的表现是多方面的， 且具有普遍性。

trans.tranOther: a wide range of interests, tastes, etc; liberality
